overview_of_class: Fundamentals of fluid mechanics. Properties and statics of fluids. Kinematics and dynamics of fluid motion-continuity, momentum and energy equations. Dimensional analysis, flow in closed conduits.
name: Fluid Mechanics I
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 241-0-01 Fluid Mechanics I

descriptions.value: Fundamentals of fluid mechanics. Properties and statics of fluids. Kinematics and dynamics of fluid motion-continuity, momentum and energy equations. Dimensional analysis, flow in closed conduits.
